item.title: You Probably Don't Need Media Queries Anymore
item.description: With screens available in any size you can imagine, it's time to shift our approach towards responsive design – the era of breakpoints is over and the era of fluid design is here. Modern CSS has fantastic support for responsive design that ensures you won't ever have to write a media query again (if you don't want to).
item.content:encoded: With screens available in any size you can imagine, it's time to shift our approach towards responsive design – the era of breakpoints is over and the era of fluid design is here. Modern CSS has fantastic support for responsive design that ensures you won't ever have to write a media query again (if you don't want to).
